abstract: Hewlett-Packard’s board chose equal parts pragmatism, aggressiveness and surprise with its hiring of Léo Apotheker as the company’s new chief executive.
snippet: Hewlett-Packard’s board chose equal parts pragmatism, aggressiveness and surprise with its hiring of Léo Apotheker as the company’s new chief executive.
lead_paragraph: Hewlett-Packard‘s board chose equal parts pragmatism, aggressiveness and surprise with its hiring of Léo Apotheker as the company’s new chief executive, Ashlee Vance writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Former SAP Chief to Lead Hewlett-Packard
